Package works

Class Miner

java.lang.Object
base.Man
works.Miner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Movement
public class Miner extends Man
A specialization of Man. The Miner walks through the map in search of GoldOreMineral objects. When found one, call the method crushingGoldOre().
The icon for the Miner are 'M'.
Author:
Fernando Tarrino del Pozo (FernandoEsra)
See Also:
  • Man
  • Board
  • InteractController

  • Constructor Details

    • Miner

      public Miner(int ID, int HP, Money money, int mapX, int mapY, int speed)
      Create a new Miner and set the icon to 'M'.
      The Man object create a random name automatically.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID for the Miner.
      HP - Starting life points (HP) of the Miner.
      money - Starting Money of the Miner.
      mapX - Starting height position on the Board.
      mapY - Starting width position on the Board.
      speed - Starting speed of the Miner.

  • Method Details

    • crushingGoldOre

      public MinedGold crushingGoldOre(GoldOreMineral mineral)
      This method takes an object of type GoldOreMineral to "grind" it into mined gold. It will return a total of between 50% and 200% of the original amount.
      Parameters:
      mineral - A GoldOreMineral object to take the amount value
      Returns:
      A MinedGold object with the amount value between the 90% and the 50% of the amont value of the GoldOreMineral

      public String toString()

      toString in class Man
